actions.parameters: 4;Any;Objective: don't let enemies capture the tower in the middle of the Oasis.
4;Any;If you manage to hold on for 90 minutes, you win.
4;Any;Enemy scout attacks incoming from all sides!
4;Any;Transport ship carrying weapons crashed on the west coast!
4;Any;Hurry! You have 7 minutes before the pirates steal the cargo!
4;Any;We found substantial about of food near the graveyard.
4;Any;You have 7 minutes before scavengers eat all of it.
4;Any;We found a large number of tools at the wastelands in the north. Hurry!
4;Any;A weapons shipment crashed on the west coast.
4;Any;We only have 5 minutes to steal it.
4;Any;We dug out weapons at the graveyard. They might come in handy.
4;Any;You have 5 minutes before someone snatches them!
4;Any;We found more food at the wasteland in the north!
4;Any;Our transport ship has finally arrive on the west coast!
